personal_info.name: MAHESHWARAN K
personal_info.title: XR Developer | Extended Reality Specialist
personal_info.tagline: Crafting immersive experiences that bridge reality and imagination
personal_info.about: Recent graduate passionate about Extended Reality technologies. Skilled in developing AR/VR/MR applications using Unity, Unreal Engine, and web-based XR frameworks. Committed to creating engaging, user-centric immersive experiences.

projects.title: Virtual Museum Explorer
projects.description: An immersive VR museum experience allowing users to explore historical artifacts in 3D space with interactive information panels and spatial audio narration.

projects.title: AR Furniture Placement App
projects.description: Mobile AR application that allows users to visualize furniture in their real-world environment before purchasing, with realistic shadows and scaling.

projects.title: WebXR Solar System
projects.description: Interactive 3D solar system accessible through web browsers, supporting both desktop and VR headsets. Users can explore planets and learn about celestial bodies.
features: VR mode support for immersive viewing
Responsive design for mobile and desktop

projects.title: MR Collaborative Workspace
projects.description: Mixed reality application for collaborative design reviews, allowing multiple users to interact with 3D models in a shared physical space.

projects.title: VR Fitness Training
projects.description: Gamified VR fitness application with real-time exercise tracking, virtual personal trainer, and progress analytics.

projects.title: AR Navigation Guide
projects.description: Indoor/outdoor AR navigation app using GPS and spatial anchors to overlay directional arrows and location markers in real-world view.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science
